Message of condolence to Russian President
    Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, President of the Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly, sent a message of condolence to Russian President Vladimir Vladimirovich Putin on August 21.
 He in the message expressed condolences to the president and the bereaved families of those killed in a helicopter crash.

DPRK delegation leaves for Africa
     Pyongyang, August 22 (KCNA) -- A DPRK delegation headed by Yang Hyong Sop, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly (SPA), left here today to visit Namibia, Angola and South Africa and participate in the world summit on sustained development to be held in South Africa.
 It was seen off at the airport by Kim Yun Hyok, secretary of the SPA Presidium, Kung Sok Ung, vice-minister of foreign affairs, officials concerned and Tian Baozhen, Chinese charge d'affaires here.
